channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: One of 2 National Guard members shot in D.C. has died, Trump says
item.description: Two members of the West Virginia National Guard were shot a few blocks from the White House on Wednesday, and a suspect identified as an Afghan nation...

item.title: Second National Guard member shot in D.C. is "fighting for his life," Trump says
item.description: President Trump told reporters Thursday evening that 20-year-old Army Spc. Sarah Beckstrom died from her injuries in the Washington, D.C., shooting.

item.title: One of the National Guard troops shot in D.C. attack has died, Trump says
item.description: President Trump told reporters Thursday night that Army Spc. Sarah Beckstrom has died. Beckstrom was one of the National Guard troops shot in Wednesda...

item.title: National Guard shooting suspect served in CIA counterterrorism unit, group says

item.title: Fuzzy Zoeller, golf champion haunted by racist joke about Tiger Woods, dies at 74
item.description: Two-time golf champion Fuzzy Zoeller has died at the age of 74. One of golf's most gregarious characters Zoeller's career was tainted by a racially in...

item.title: What was 'Operation Allies Welcome,' which allowed some Afghans entry into the U.S.?
item.description: The Afghan man suspected of shooting two National Guard members entered the U.S. under the program in 2021. Here's a look at why it was set up and how...

item.title: Fever helps the body fight off viruses: But how does it work?
item.description: New research shows feverish temperatures make it more difficult for viruses to hijack our cells. A mouse study suggests it's the heat itself that make...

item.title: Soleil, a Belgian sheepdog, takes Best in Show at the National Dog Show

item.title: Trump criticizes the program that brought Afghan refugees to the US who fought the Taliban
Palestinian-US teen freed after nine months in Israeli jail
item.description: Mohammed Ibrahim, now 16, was on holiday from Florida when he was arrested for allegedly throwing rocks at Jewish settlers in the occupied West Bank.

item.title: Putin doubles down on demands for Ukrainian territory ahead of talks with US in Moscow
item.description: The Russian president accuses Kyiv of wanting to fight "to the last Ukrainian" - which he says Russia is also "in principle" ready to do.

item.title: Death toll in Hong Kong high-rise fire rises to 94 as 3 people are arrested
item.description: A deadly blaze ripped through bamboo scaffolding on a multi-tower housing estate in Hong Kong, killing dozens of people and leaving hundreds more miss...

item.title: Firefighters search for hundreds still missing in devastating Hong Kong tower blocks fire
item.description: Dozens of people have died and hundreds remain unaccounted for after Wednesday's blaze.

item.title: Trump administration orders green card "reexamination" from "countries of concern"
item.description: The review comes after an Afghan national who arrived in the U.S. in 2021 was arrested in the shooting of two National Guard members.
